meanings.sent2: The earthquake caused deformational shifts in the landscape, creating new valleys and mountains.
meanings.sent3: The deformational impact of the toddler's toy hammer on the block tower was both surprising and amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a deformational quality, reshaping the solemn atmosphere into one of joy and lightness.
meanings.sent5: The artist used a deformational technique to distort the image, giving it a unique and intriguing look.
